description:
Thank you for choosing the “Wine Tasting Essentials" video-course of THE WINE NOTARY.

This course collects all the most important concepts that you really need to become a real wine taster in a very short time.

It is designed for those who seriously want to get closer to the knowledge and consumption of quality fine wines thanks to a careful selection and synthesis of the fundamental notions concerning the production, the grading, the wine tasting and the combination with food.

It is ideal for those who do not have much time to spend attending classroom courses but still has a lot of passion for wine and want to quickly become a good wine taster as it is a valuable tool for self-taught learners.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR

Born in Milan from Venetian parents, Lorenzo Barichella is an Italian sommelier of A.I.S. (Italian Sommelier Association) and the founder of “THE WINE NOTARY” which is a company which provides training and selection of wines all over the world and “DiVino Sapere” which is an independent Italian wine tasting school.

After having graduated at A.I.S. many years ago and having worked with wines with great enjoyment, he has always preferred to interact with the audience by developing a simple teaching method and an extremely easy wine tasting system.

This system is now available in English through this video-course and also through the “Wine Tasting Essentials” manual which represent a very quick and innovative way to become a real wine taster in a very short time.
